to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Slackware 11 aliases, anyone?
body:
I use a combination of package management functionality such as apt
tools with the wajig front end.  and building straight from source.
It is a good thing to be able to do both as sometimes, I find it
necessary to switch back and forth between the two.  




-- 
Spie Smith: C.S.F.C.
Computer Scientist For CHRIST
